software.amazon.s3.analyticsaccelerator.util.retry

Class SeekableInputStreamRetryStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • software.amazon.s3.analyticsaccelerator.util.retry.SeekableInputStreamRetryStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    software.amazon.s3.analyticsaccelerator.util.retry.RetryStrategy

    public class SeekableInputStreamRetryStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements software.amazon.s3.analyticsaccelerator.util.retry.RetryStrategy
    Retry strategy implementation for seekable input stream operations. Uses Failsafe library to execute operations with configurable retry policies.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SeekableInputStreamRetryStrategy()
      Creates a retry strategy with no retry policies (no retries).
      SeekableInputStreamRetryStrategy(java.util.List<RetryPolicy> policies)
      Creates a retry strategy with a list of retry policies.
      SeekableInputStreamRetryStrategy(RetryPolicy outerPolicy, RetryPolicy... policies)
      Creates a retry strategy with one or more retry policies.
